          <title>
            <string language="en">Half-life measurement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbwertzeitmessen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de demi vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Medida do half-life</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figure shows an experimental set-up to measure the half-life of the radioactive decay of protactinium-234.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">half-life measurement</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildung zeigt eine experimentelle 
Installation, um die Halbwertzeit des radioaktiven Zerfalls von 
protactinium-234 zu messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La figure montre que une installation 
expérimentale mesurait la demi vie de l'affaiblissement radioactif de
protactinium-234.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A figura mostra uma instalação experimental para
medir o half-life da deterioração radioativa de protactinium-234.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La figura mostra una messa a punto sperimentale 
per misurare il periodo radioattivo del deperimento radioattivo di 
protactinium-234.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αριθμός εμφανίζει πειραματική οργάνωση για να 
μετρήσει την ημιζωή της ραδιενεργού αποσύνθεσης 
protactinium-234.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La figura muestra una disposición experimental 
para medir el período del decaimiento radiactivo de protactinium-234.</string>
          </description>
